pageContext.projectSummary: Cluse is a Sketch plugin that serves as a diagnostic tool to ensure that the design meets WCAG color contrast standards. To address the lack of an accessibility workflow on design teams, I set out to create a tool that is free, open-source, lightweight and baked into the tool designers use most.
pageContext.projectProcess:
Unfortunately, accessibility is not an organic part of a visual designer's workflow. This is not because designers do not care. It's simply too inconvenient given the current set tools. Without built-in accessibility diagnostics, designers resort to external sources to ensure that their design is up to standard. I set out to create a plugin to promote inclusive design habits for Sketch users. 

In-depth process information can be read on my website, at yg.is/cluse/
